questions.question: What additional functions is ComfyUI-Openpose-Editor-Plus expected to add in the future?
questions.answer: ComfyUI-Openpose-Editor-Plus is expected to add the functions of background reference and imported poses on the basis of editing character actions.

status.question: Is the feature to add background reference and imported poses currently available in ComfyUI-Openpose-Editor-Plus?
status.answer: No, the feature to add background reference and imported poses is not currently available in ComfyUI-Openpose-Editor-Plus, as the project is busy and the implementation of these features is uncertain.
